name: Donal Gleeson Memorial
info: This time last year our friend and club mate Donal Gleeson was taken from us suddenly following the 312 in Majorca. This week’s race, which will become a yearly event, is run in his honour. A perpetual memorial cup will be presented to the winner after the race at the finish line by members of Donal’s family
The race will be run as a handicap for all 4 groups, Limit going off first with a healthy handicap and Scratch last
Distance will likely be just 2 laps of Green Sheds circuit (~35km), so short and sharp
Points for first 6 riders across the line
